code:
%%{Logistics_TrackingNumber}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
title: SM-03.01 — Proposal Lifecycle (Logistics_Warehouse)

[Logistics_Warehouse] --> DRAFT : ProposalCreated (Logistics_FleetManagement)
note right of DRAFT
  Authoring & validation:
  • proposalId assigned
  • schema/policy checks
end note

DRAFT --> REVIEW : SubmittedForReview
note right of REVIEW
  Guard reviews (Logistics_Warehouse)
  Can request changes or reject
end note

REVIEW --> DRAFT : ChangesRequested
REVIEW --> REJECTED : RejectedAtReview
REVIEW --> OPEN_FOR_VOTE : ApprovedForVoting (Logistics_DeliveryRoute)

OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> OPEN_FOR_VOTE : VoteCast (Logistics_DeliveryRoute)
OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> TALLYING : VotingClosed

TALLYING --> DECIDED_APPROVED : VoteTallied → Approved (Logistics_StockLevel)
TALLYING --> DECIDED_REJECTED : VoteTallied → Rejected (Logistics_DeliveryRoute)

DECIDED_APPROVED --> EXECUTION : DecisionRecorded (Logistics_Warehouse)
DECIDED_REJECTED --> ARCHIVED : DecisionRecorded (Logistics_Warehouse)

EXECUTION --> EXECUTED : PolicyChanged / GrantApproved / ProjectApproved (Logistics_StockLevel)
EXECUTION --> EXECUTION_FAILED : ExecutionFailed

EXECUTION_FAILED --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (Logistics_DeliveryRoute)
EXECUTION_FAILED --> RETRY_EXEC : RetryAuthorized
RETRY_EXEC --> EXECUTION : ReExecute

EXECUTED --> AUDIT : ExecutionCompleted
AUDIT --> ARCHIVED : AuditLogged (Logistics_StockLevel)

%% Appeals (Logistics_FleetManagement)
OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (Logistics_Warehouse)
DECIDED_APPROVED --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (Logistics_Warehouse)
DECIDED_REJECTED --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (Logistics_DeliveryRoute)

APPEAL --> DECIDED_APPROVED : AppealResolved → uphold
APPEAL --> DECIDED_REJECTED : AppealResolved → overturn
APPEAL --> ARCHIVED : AppealWithdrawn

%% Cancellations
DRAFT --> CANCELLED : WithdrawnByAuthor
OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> CANCELLED : CancelledByAuthority
CANCELLED --> ARCHIVED : Archived

%% Terminal states
REJECTED --> [Logistics_FleetManagement]
ARCHIVED --> [Logistics_FleetManagement]

%% ===== Styling =====
classDef core fill:#ff8b00,stroke:#333,color:#fff,font-weight:bold;
class DRAFT,REVIEW,OPEN_FOR_VOTE,TALLYING,DECIDED_APPROVED,DECIDED_REJECTED,EXECUTION,EXECUTED,EXECUTION_FAILED,RETRY_EXEC,APPEAL,AUDIT,ARCHIVED,REJECTED,CANCELLED core;
repo_description: The cohersphere architecture — structural blueprint of the resonance network. Defines the modular layers connecting app, API, and governance protocols. Outlines data flows for Proof-of-Contribution, c

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 我们需要加一个处理 Logistics_Warehouse 和 Logistics_FleetManagement 的环节。
等等，我重新想了一下，应该是 Logistics_Warehouse处理 才对。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'Logistics_Warehouse处理'？
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 Logistics_Warehouse 和 Logistics_DeliveryRoute 的分支。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'Logistics_Warehouse 和 Logistics_DeliveryRoute'？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 Logistics_DeliveryRoute 和 Logistics_StockLevel 的环节。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Logistics_DeliveryRoute 和 Logistics_StockLevel'，你看看合适吗？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 Logistics_DeliveryRoute 和 Logistics_Warehouse 的分支。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'Logistics_DeliveryRoute 和 Logistics_Warehouse'，对吧？
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 Logistics_Warehouse 和 Logistics_StockLevel 的分支。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Logistics_Warehouse 和 Logistics_StockLevel'，你看看合适吗？
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 Logistics_DeliveryRoute 和 Logistics_StockLevel。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'Logistics_DeliveryRoute 和 Logistics_StockLevel'？
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 Logistics_FleetManagement 和 Logistics_Warehouse。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Logistics_FleetManagement 和 Logistics_Warehouse'，你看看合适吗？
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 Logistics_Warehouse 和 Logistics_DeliveryRoute 的逻辑。
不，其实叫 Logistics_Warehouse处理 会更准确一点。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'Logistics_Warehouse处理'。
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
